name: Continuum (itch)
description:
continuum is an atmospheric sidescrolling exploration / puzzle game where each level is literally endless.

play as this ghost dude.

he's dead but somehow still around?

each level is a memory, soft and changing.

walk long enough and you'll loop around.

will you be able to find peace?

developed by @bakufreak

with sound by @jujuadams

made in 48 hours for the 15th gm(48) gamejam (it got 4th place)

then updated in a few weeks for the 2015 indie game making contest
